+ g++ -std=c++11 rangeCountSequential.cpp -o r_seq
+ nvcc -std=c++11 rangeCount.cu -o r_par
+ set +x

Expected results using file_1000000.txt 
(first line Q2a,b, second line Q2c) : 
 100128	100146	99786	99946	100170	99652	100130	100182	99926	99934	
 100128	200274	300060	400006	500176	599828	699958	800140	900066	1000000	

Sequential run:
+ ./r_seq file_1000000.txt 1000000
100128	100146	99786	99946	100170	99652	100130	100182	99926	99934	
100128	200274	300060	400006	500176	599828	699958	800140	900066	1000000	
+ set +x

Parallel run:
+ ./r_par file_1000000.txt 1000000
100128	100146	99786	99946	100170	99652	100130	100182	99926	99934	
100128	100146	99786	99946	100170	99652	100130	100182	99926	99934	
100128	200274	300060	400006	500176	599828	699958	800140	900066	1000000	
+ set +x
